title: Digital Environment Utilization Strategies for Advanced Electric Circuit Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic principles of electrical circuits and physical concepts
context.additional_context: VR/simulation-based education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, advanced electrical circuit learning for social sector applications

learning_goals: Learners can perform in-depth analysis and resolution of complex electrical circuit problems in digital learning environments
Learners can visually explain circuit design principles using simulation tools
Learners achieve deep learning performance improvements of over 20% compared to traditional instructional methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
